track.name: Algorithms
track.descriptions: The true test of problem solving: when one realizes that time and memory aren't infinite.

primary_contest.description: 101 Hack is back with its 35th edition! Passionate programmers will enjoy solving algorithmic challenges. It's all about speed, accuracy and efficiency: 5 challenges in 120 minutes. Every second counts!
primary_contest.name: 101 Hack March 2016

model.name: Save the Prisoner!
model.php_template:
<?php

$handle = fopen ("php://stdin", "r");
function saveThePrisoner($n, $m, $s){
    // Complete this function
}

fscanf($handle, "%d",$t);
for($a0 = 0; $a0 < $t; $a0++){
    fscanf($handle, "%d %d %d", $n, $m, $s);
    $result = saveThePrisoner($n, $m, $s);
    echo $result . "\n";
}

?>
model.haskell_template:
import Control.Applicative
import Control.Monad
import System.IO


main :: IO ()
main = do
    t_temp <- getLine
    let t = read t_temp :: Int
    forM_ [1..t] $ \a0  -> do
        n_temp <- getLine
        let n_t = words n_temp
        let n = read $ n_t!!0 :: Int
        let m = read $ n_t!!1 :: Int
        let s = read $ n_t!!2 :: Int


getMultipleLines :: Int -> IO [String]

getMultipleLines n
    | n <= 0 = return []
    | otherwise = do          
        x <- getLine         
        xs <- getMultipleLines (n-1)    
        let ret = (x:xs)    
        return ret
model.preview: Given M sweets and a circular queue of N prisoners, find the ID of the last prisoner to receive a sweet.
model.clojure_template:
(use '[clojure.string :only (split triml)])

(
        let [
          t_t (read-line) 
          t (Integer/parseInt t_t) 
        ]

      (
        loop [a0 t]
        (when (> a0 0)

          (
            let [
              n_temp (read-line) 
              n_t (split n_temp #"\s+") 
              n (Integer/parseInt (n_t 0)) 
              m (Integer/parseInt (n_t 1)) 
              s (Integer/parseInt (n_t 2)) 
            ]
          )

        (recur (- a0 1) ) )
      )

)
model.erlang_template:
-module(solution).
-export([main/0]).

main() ->

    { ok, [T]} = io:fread("", "~d"),
    T_list = lists:seq(1,T),
    lists:foreach( fun(T0) ->
            { ok, [N,M,S]} = io:fread("", "~d~d~d")
    end,T_list),
    true.

read_array(0,D) -> [];
read_array(N,D) -> 
	{ok, [X]} = io:fread("", D),
	[X | read_array(N-1,D)].

read_2darray(0,M,D) -> [];
read_2darray(N,M,D) ->
	Q=read_array(M,D),
	[Q | read_2darray(N-1,M,D)].
model.lua_template:
function saveThePrisoner(n, m, s)
    -- Complete this function

t = io.read("*number", "*l")
a0 = 0
while a0 < t do
    n,m,s = io.read("*number", "*number", "*number", "*l")
    a0 = a0 + 1
end
